title: <sup><acronym title='Leider ist diese Information in Deutsch nicht verfügbar.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Machine Learning: Supervised Techniques
ziele: <sup><acronym title='Leider ist diese Information in Deutsch nicht verfügbar.'>(*)</acronym></sup> This practical course complements the lecture "Machine Learning: Supervised Techniques" and aims at practicing the concepts and methods acquired in the lecture.
lehrinhalte:
(*)
  • Basics of classification and regression
  • Evaluation of machine learning results (confusion matrices, ROC)
  • Under- and overfitting / bias and variance
  • Cross-validation and hyperparameter selection
  • Logistic regression
  • Support vector machines and kernels
  • Neural networks and deep networks
  • Time series (sequence) analysis
  • Bagging and boosting
  • Feature selection and feature construction
beurteilung: <sup><acronym title='Leider ist diese Information in Deutsch nicht verfügbar.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Marking is based on homework
methoden: <sup><acronym title='Leider ist diese Information in Deutsch nicht verfügbar.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Students are given assignments in 1-2 week intervals. Homework must be handed in. Results are to be presented and discussed in the course.
literatur:
<sup><acronym title='Leider ist diese Information in Deutsch nicht verfügbar.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Assignments and homework submissions are managed via JKU Moodle.
Where necessary, complimentary course material is provided for download.
equivalent:
(*)in collaboration with 875BIN2MUTU13: UE Machine Learning: Unsupervised Techniques (1,5 ECTS) equivalent to
875BIN2TMLU12: UE Theoretical Bioinformatics and Machine Learning (3 ECTS) -or- BIMPHUEBIN2: UE Bioinformatik II: Theoretische Bioinformatik und Maschinelles Lernen (3 ECTS)
